model

Class Raft

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Raft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Raft
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Is a class, that describe raft in the game. All interaction between rafts and ball (player)
    are located in the Model
    Author:
    Masev Nikita

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int RAFT_SHIFT
      This is pixel's step of raft.

      Raft(ObjectInfo objectInfo, GameField GameFieldTerra, ListenersList listeners, int threadSleep, java.util.List<Raft> raftList, java.lang.Object sync)
      Install communication between listeners, objectInfo, gameFieldTerra, raftList with the same object in Model, also set to object of synchronization.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Raft

        public Raft(ObjectInfo objectInfo,
    GameField GameFieldTerra,
    ListenersList listeners,
    int threadSleep,
    java.util.List<Raft> raftList,
    java.lang.Object sync)
        Install communication between listeners, objectInfo, gameFieldTerra, raftList with the same object in Model, also set to object of synchronization.
        Parameters:
        objectInfo - is a information about Raft
        GameFieldTerra - is object of game field
        listeners - is a common listener from Model
        threadSleep - delay between tasks of the thread
        raftList - store thread's object raft
        sync - object of the synchronization

        public void startThreadRaft()
        Launch object of Raft in the single thread.
        Synchronization need for threads,
        that wait each other and will be launched in series
